awards:
第48届卡罗维发利国际电影节(2013)
　　东方阵营奖(提名) 亚历山德拉·斯特里亚纳亚

director.name: 亚历山德拉·斯特里亚纳亚 Alexandra Strelyanaya

introduction: Whatever he was doing in this turbulent Moscow student life, he was always dreamed of the Northern Sea.Whenever she went poaching the sea side, like all her friends, she was dreaming of the high sky and the impossible love. When the summer came he decided to break away from Moscow to breathe the fresh salty air of the sea. That's when they met. That's when they fell in love. A young director, he sees cinema all around him, a true dreamer, she hih with their love. This sunner brings them as close as only possible but what will happen when it comes to the end?
